mapper.select: SELECT A.RNO ,A.RCONTENT ,A.BNO ,A.MNICK ,TO_CHAR(A.RINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RINSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.RUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RUPDATEDATE ,A.RDELETEYN FROM REPLY A WHERE A.BNO = #{bno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RDELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY RNO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET RDELETEYN = 'Y' ,RUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE RNO = #{rno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RDELETEYN = 'Y'
